meanings.definition: A type of venomous spider known for its distinctive violin-shaped marking on its back.
meanings.sent1: I saw some fiddlebacks in the garden today.
meanings.sent2: The fiddlebacks are dangerous because of their venom.
meanings.sent3: The fiddlebacks were having a tiny violin concert in the corner.
meanings.sent4: The fiddlebacks danced across the floor like tiny violinists.
meanings.sent5: Beware of the fiddlebacks with their violin markings!

meanings.definition: The back of a violin or similar stringed instrument.
meanings.sent1: The fiddlebacks of the violin were beautifully carved.
meanings.sent2: She gently placed her fingers on the fiddlebacks of the cello.
meanings.sent3: The musician accidentally sat on the delicate fiddlebacks of his violin.
meanings.sent4: The fiddlebacks of the guitar gleamed under the stage lights.
meanings.sent5: The intricate fiddlebacks of the instrument added to its elegance.
